title: Slow cooker potato and bacon soup
ingredients: ['6 slices bacon, cut into 1.25cm pieces', '1 onion, finely chopped', '600ml concentrated chicken stock', '475ml water', '5 large potatoes, diced', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon dried dill', '1/2 teaspoon ground white pepper', '60g plain flour', '475ml single cream', '350ml evaporated milk']
